background_description: The background consists primarily of dry, reddish-brown soil, uneven and clumpy, with various pieces of dried organic matter such as dead leaves and blades of grass scattered across it. There are also several vibrant green blades of live grass protruding, some in focus, some blurred in the foreground. Shadows are present, adding to the texture and depth of the environment.
camouflage_type: Color blending / Pattern matching / Shadow hiding
explanation: The frog exhibits excellent camouflage. Its dorsal coloration is a mix of muted browns, greens, and yellowish tones, which blend remarkably well with the dry soil, dead grass, and even the live green grass blades in the environment. The darker spots and irregular markings on its back and sides mimic the dappled light and shadow patterns, as well as the varied textures of the soil clumps and organic debris. The frog's overall low contrast against the background, despite its prominent eye, makes it very difficult to spot at first glance. It leverages both color blending and pattern matching to disappear into its surroundings.
